title: The Jinx
description:
FAM!!! We are SO excited to share episode 1 of our Patreon coverage of "The Jinx." This might be our most beloved of ALL the Patreon episodes! You can get our other 5 episodes covering "The Jinx" plus over 140 FULL BONUS episodes at the $5 level on Patreon RIGHT NOW BY CLICKING HERE!

All patreon episodes are Ad-Free! And we've covered all the great series like "I'll Be Gone in the Dark" "McMillions" "Serial" "The Staircase" "Making a Murderer" "Tiger King" "The Murder of Laci Peterson" "The Menendez Murders" and SO MUCH MORE! Click here to join the party!
